Package data

Class Rubric

java.lang.Object
data.Rubric
public class Rubric extends Object
Models an assignment for a classroom. The Rubric class contains the name of the submission and a list of RubricRow objects that contain grading criteria. The data is similar to a 2D array. It is recommended to initialize the Rubric through the input of a csv file. The first column lists the names of the grading criteria. The top row lists the score that is given to each of the aspects of criteria.
Author:
Kaz Nakao
